questions.question: What is the primary color of the packaging's background?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
What material appears to constitute the product packaging?
Describing the texture, is the packaging surface glossy or matte?
What color are the small illustrations on the packaging?
What is the dominant graphic element depicted on the box?
What language(s) are used in the text on the package?
What is the general style of the text font used on the box?
Is the text on the packaging primarily horizontally or vertically oriented?
Considering the size indication, is this a large or small package?
What is the weight of the product indicated on the packaging?
Are there any noticeable folds or creases visible on the box?
Does the box have any visible seals or tamper-evident features?
Is the packaging design minimalist or ornate?
Are there any noticeable logos or brand markings apparent?
